game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: As a brave adventurer, your mission is to find the long-lost artifact hidden deep in the ancient ruins of Zantria. Legend has it that whoever possesses this artifact will gain unimaginable power. Are you up for the challenge?
game.reward: A bag of gold coins and eternal glory

tasks.description: Find the entrance to the ruins
tasks.objective: Locate the hidden entrance to the ancient ruins of Zantria
Navigate through the treacherous labyrinth and avoid the traps
Decode the ancient riddles to access the inner sanctum
Search for the long-lost artifact and retrieve it
